headline.print_headline: U.S. Contractor Pleads Guilty to Giving Chinese Woman Secrets
headline.main: U.S. Contractor Pleads Guilty to Giving Chinese Woman Secrets

lead_paragraph: A U.S. defense contractor in Hawaii pleaded guilty on Thursday to charges he passed national defense secrets, including classified information on joint training and planning exercises with South Korea, to a Chinese woman with whom he was romantically involved, prosecutors said.
